system.requirement: Your rhino is an unstoppable force.

abilities.description: Overrun: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} by riding your rhino against a pack of foes, add +1 and inflict +1 harm on a hit.

No Fear: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by charging into combat, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Hardened Hide: When you make the Companion @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} move in a fight, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
